3.0.8.en: Netgear package 4.0.3. Fix login during pair. Switch to Homey Compose app structure. Migrate 'SSID' to 'ssid' capability. Compatibility test timeout fix.

3.0.7.en: Netgear package 4.0.0. Added more validity checks for attached devices. Compatibility test timeout partial fix.

3.0.5.en: Netgear package 3.9.9. Fixed fw update on R7000. Fix parsing of <unknown> devices. Fix delete Devicelist. Selectable login method added.

3.0.4.en: Presence Detection and Energy support - stable release

3.0.3.en: Energy and Presence detection - Stable release

3.1.0.en: Netgear package 4.0.3. Added empty devicelist check.

3.2.0.en: Netgear package 4.1.0. Message queueing and rate limiting. onInit stability improvements.

3.2.2.en: Fix Homey V5 compatibility. Removed multiple router support for attached devices.

3.2.4.en: Package update. http(s) timeout fix netgear@4.3.1

3.2.5.en: Netgear package 4.3.3. Fixed double flowcard naming issue. German translation updated. German and Dutch readme added.

3.3.0.en: Netgear package 4.4.1. Added discovery of orbilogin.net. Added support for SOAP port 5555.

4.0.2.en: Rewrite to SDK3. Fix some flow cards.

4.1.0.en: Fix pasword failure on pair. Fix crash on firmware check. Fix crash on setGuestWifi. Updated app store image.

4.1.1.en: Fix pasword failure on pair. Fix crash on firmware check. Fix crash on setGuestWifi. Updated app store images.
